video.title: Ikki Tousen: Xtreme Xecutor
video.synopsis: The schools are at peace, but that doesn't stop the girls from picking fights with each other -- culminating in a big, clothes-shredding tournament.

episodes.synopsis: Sworn to avenge her brother’s death, novice warrior Mouki infiltrates the killer’s academy, then must test her skills against his fierce defenders.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Bookish team leader Gentuko and her Saito Academy pals befriend the defeated Mouki and reveal the secret behind their intense warrior bond.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Mouki convinces powerful fighter Hakufu to mentor her and undergoes grueling training in preparation for a mysterious all-schools tournament.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: While Hakufu visits her sister, the Saito Academy fighters set sail for the tournament but soon discover a vicious rival team has invaded their boat.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Ambushed, Kanu and Ekitoku fall overboard, but their pals are captured and forced to Nanban Island. In a bathhouse, Gentuko battles rival Shimei.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Mouki and Kyocho escape, and Kanu is called to the fight arena by sinister mastermind Kentei. Hakufu, moved by an intense vision, rushes to Nanban.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Determined to unleash Gentoku’s inner dragon, Kentei launches a demonic attack on the Seito team, who now realize the tournament is a trap.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: In the nick of time, Hakufu rejoins her team as they battle Kentei, while Kanu fights the vengeful one-eyed dragon warrior Shimei.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: In a desperate search for Kanu, Mouki, Hakufu and her cousin Koukin battle their way through the heavily guarded, labyrinthine Nanban fortress.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: As Kanu and Shimei’s to-the-death battle rages, Hakufu is buried in rubble while trying to protect Koukin from Kentei’s fierce disciple Teni.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: After Hakufu’s battered body is restored and Kentei’s identity revealed, the epic conflict between the ancient warriors comes to its brutal climax.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: To celebrate their victory and safe return to Saito, the teens throw a party for Gentoku, unaware that in another part of town, a new evil lurks.
episodes.title: Episode 12
